body_html: This is expected. We're serializing tensors via a custom code path, but numpy arrays go through regular pickler. There are known problems when you serialize arrays that are >2GB (probably overflows in Python's C code). Won't fix.
body_text: This is expected. We're serializing tensors via a custom code path, but numpy arrays go through regular pickler. There are known problems when you serialize arrays that are >2GB (probably overflows in Python's C code). Won't fix.
body: This is expected. We're serializing tensors via a custom code path, but numpy arrays go through regular pickler. There are known problems when you [serialize arrays that are >2GB](https://bugs.python.org/msg134369) (probably overflows in Python's C code). Won't fix.
